page.title: 19INDOOR ACTIVITIES
page.content: {Women's hobbies}include knitting and sewing, as well as traditional crafts such as rugmaking, quilting, patchwork, lacemaking, weaving and collage. A number have knitting machines and most own sewing machines. Less than 1% adults play a{musical {instrument,}but there are talented organists,pianists, guitar players and a concertina player. Several households own a piano, and children are learning to play piano, organ, violin, recorder, drums and whistle. Many have{collections}_stamps, postcards, china pigs, badges etc. {Men}are interested in DIY, racing, photography, carving and football. TV and radio are popular. Some attend {classes}in other villages, go out for meals, and runs in the car. Men attend{football matches}regularly in Sunderland or Newcastle.
